message.entry: The ''ChunkSize'' option must be specified if Deflate, SZIP, Shuffle, Fletcher32 checksum, or Custom Filter is enabled.
The class of FillValue (''{0}'') does not match the class of the dataset (''{1}'').
The length of CHUNKSIZE must equal the length of SIZE.
Cannot specify a chunk size larger than the dataset size.
To extend the extents of the dataset, specify ''ChunkSize''.
The dataset should be specified as a full pathname with a leading ''/''.
Only primitive numeric datatypes have fill value support.
''CustomFilterID'' must be specified if ''CustomFilterParameters'' is defined.
Variable-length strings are not supported with Custom Filters. To create fixed-length strings with a Custom Filter, use low-level function H5D.create.
Simultaneous enabling of deflate and SZIP compression not supported in h5create. Use low-level functions H5P.set_deflate and H5P.set_szip.
Invalid input combination. Specify "SZIPEncodingMethod" as either "entropy" or "nearestneighbor" to enable SZIP compression.
For SZIP compression number of pixels per block ({0}) must be less than or equal to number of elements per dataset chunk ({1}).
